data.name: Police Shootout Demo
data.detailed_description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1449820/Police_Interceptors/


Jump straight into Police intervention. Based on many real stories, feel the thrill of real action. As a police enforcer you need to help, protect and prevent crime in the field.


NEGOTIATE WITH CRIMINALS
Try to get out of a bad situation peacefully, or try to trick them and push the pressure. Dialogue with criminals is not easy but if you succeed, you will be closer to receiving a new badge!


AIM AND SHOOT
Use one of your weapons when you need to neutralize the criminal. You can choose aiming mode to be more precise.


HELP YOUR PARTNER
Call for an ambulance if your partner was shot! You can’t let him down!
Cover them or pass the gun or magazine to your partner.


CHECK DATA AND FILES
You can connect to the database and use the files to make sure you caught the right person or car!


COLLECT BADGES AND GET PROMOTED
Arrest the criminals, save the hostages and earn more badges! Maybe you will get a promotion and more interesting actions?


GET INTO THE SLOW MOTION
Jump to slow motion mode to avoid bullets in hard situations.

data.short_description: Jump straight into Police intervention. Based on many real stories, feel the thrill of real action. As a police enforcer you need to help, protect and prevent crime in the field.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit / Windows 8 64 Bit / Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 780
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit / Windows 8 64 Bit / Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
